title: Electric field on surface of conductor shown

content.question: The conductor shown above is given a negative charge that spreads over its surface. Which of the following best represents the direction of the electric field at the point P on the cylindrical portion of the conductor?

choices.label: An arrow points down and to the right ending at the point labeled P.
An arrow begins at the point labeled P and points up  and to the right.
An arrow points straight down and ends at the point  labeled P.
An arrow points down and to the left ending at the point labeled P.
An arrow begins at the.point labeled P and points  vertically up from it.

content.answer: An arrow points straight down and ends at the point  labeled P.
